title: Exception in association of connection to existing transaction
body:
I have this exception come up, unfortunately is doesn't share details of the error ( as in if its a timeout, query syntax error or whatever)


here are extracts from my datasource configuration

```properties
quarkus.datasource.jdbc.url = jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/backend?serverTimezone=UTC

quarkus.datasource.username = play
quarkus.datasource.password = ****
#quarkus.datasource.jdbc.max-size = 100
#quarkus.datasource.jdbc.min-size = 5
#quarkus.datasource.jdbc.pooling-enabled = true
#quarkus.datasource.jdbc.max-lifetime = 60
#quarkus.datasource.jdbc.idle-removal-interval = 30
#quarkus.datasource.max-size = 100
#quarkus.datasource.initial-size = 20

and initially it was this 
quarkus.datasource.username = play
quarkus.datasource.password = ****
```

so what I noticed from the method below is I get back the Query object and when I call the getResultList() this error comes up, 

When  I changed to the AgraolDatasource, the error was still there. 

```java
 public UserLog doFindByUsernameAndPartnercode(String username, String partnerCode) {
       
        UserLog obj =  null;
        try 
        {
             
               List<UserLog> query = (List<UserLog>)em.createNamedQuery(UserLog.BY_USERNAME_OR_EMAIL_AND_PARTNER, UserLog.class).setParameter("passed", username).setParameter("passed2", partnerCode).getResultList();
              
               //TypedQuery<UserLog> query = em.createNamedQuery(UserLog.BY_USERNAME_OR_EMAIL_AND_PARTNER, UserLog.class).setParameter("passed", username).setParameter("passed2", partnerCode);
                
               //System.err.println("isOpen = " + em.isOpen()+" query - "+query.size());    
                //System.out.println(" doLoadByCode query = -----> "+em.isOpen()+" max result " + query.getResultList().size()); //query.getResultList().size()
                
                //List<UserLog> resultList = query.getResultList();
                 LOGGER.info("@@@ isOpen = " + em.isOpen()+"  obj size + "+ query.size());  
                if(query != null && query.size() > 0)
                {
                      obj = query.get(0);
                     return obj;
                }
                else
                {
                    return null;// Response.status(ErrorCodes.UNKNOWN_DOC).build();
                }
       
        
        }
        catch( org.hibernate.exception.GenericJDBCException e)
        {
            LOGGER.info("GenericJDBCException = " + e.getSQLState());
            String message = e.getCause().getMessage();
            LOGGER.info("e = " + message);
            e.printStackTrace();
            return null;
        }
        
        catch (Exception e) {
             LOGGER.info("Exception = " + e);
             if(e instanceof org.hibernate.exception.GenericJDBCException)
             {
                  org.hibernate.exception.GenericJDBCException ejdbc =  (org.hibernate.exception.GenericJDBCException)e;
                  LOGGER.info("XXX Exception = " +ejdbc.getSQLState());
             }
             e.printStackTrace();
             
              return null;
        }
     
    }
```

thank you for your time and help. And also for this great work "Quarkus".
